name: Skillet Enchiladas (Vegan)
description: Seriously easy 1-pan Skillet Enchiladas are ready to eat in less than 30 minutes! Enjoy all the flavors of enchiladas without the work.
recipeIngredient: 12 ounce package impossible ground meat (see notes for options)
10 small corn tortillas or 4-5 medium flour tortillas, cut into strips
15- ounce can black beans, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large cast iron pan or other skillet over medium-high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a large cast iron pan or other skillet over medium-high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegan beef and diced onion and cook for about 10 minutes, breaking it into pieces and stirring frequently.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegan beef and diced onion and cook for about 10 minutes, breaking it into pieces and stirring frequently.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the garlic and salt, and stir for about a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add the garlic and salt, and stir for about a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cut up corn tortilla pieces, black beans, corn and enchilada sauce. Stir it up, then cover and reduce the heat to low for about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cut up corn tortilla pieces, black beans, corn and enchilada sauce. Stir it up, then cover and reduce the heat to low for about 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Uncover, sprinkle on the cheese, then cover again and remove from heat. Let it sit for a few minutes so the cheese can melt.
recipeInstructions.name: Uncover, sprinkle on the cheese, then cover again and remove from heat. Let it sit for a few minutes so the cheese can melt.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with Vegan Sour Cream, chopped green onions and sliced black olives, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with Vegan Sour Cream, chopped green onions and sliced black olives, if desired.
